fizzco_basin.name: Fizzco Basin
overseerLines: Careful… the Basin hums with leftover Fizzco experiments.
Sensors picking up unstable readings. Proceed with caution.
If you see glowing puddles, don’t touch them. Or do. I’m not your dad.

vault77_exterior.name: Vault 77 Exterior
overseerLines: If you hear puppets laughing, ignore it. Probably nothing.

mojave_fringe.name: Mojave Fringe
overseerLines: Welcome to the Mojave Fringe. Try not to melt.
Travelers pass through here often. Keep your caps ready.
Heat signatures rising. Drink water. Or don’t. I’m not your doctor.
